review: Cut the strings like they was made of paper.Really good price. Did what it was suppose, no need to say anymore.

As soon as I got this pedal I put it on my board and noticed it had a high end hum. I have a 2 Behringer pedals on my board and a lot of people say they are bad noisy pedals,but my pedal board was silent till I put this pedal on it. I've only had it for a few days, but the cons out way the pros. Maybe I will purchase a noise reducer to help clean it up a bit. Once I get around to playing with it I will write another review.
Completely quite. Connected with no problem. I own two.
I pretty much just leave these on all the time. It gives a good boost and body to my tone, with out being to distorted and dirty, but if you want that type of sound you can get it.Great price too.
Perfect pedal it sounds great no matter what your levels are. Not noisy at all so fits in with other pedals on your board great.
Easy to put together,stable and cheap. 100% would recommend. I want to get more guitar,just to get a other one.
Perfect pedal. Easy to setup easy to use. It sounds great. Durable and strong. Not noisy at all really clean pedal for your board.
